import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; class About extends Component { render(){ return (

About Us

E-Voting DApp(Decentralised Application)
This simple E-voting Decentralised App using the Ethereum Blockchain, Solidity and the MERN(MongoDB, Express.js, ReactJS, Node.js) stack
Ethereum is an open source, public, blockchain-based distributed computing platform and operating system featuring smart contract functionality.
About the D-App
The E-Voting app has 2 main users:

1. Admin

Admin can create an election and add candidates to the Ethereum Blockchain. 2. Voter

Voters can select an election and vote for a candidate of their choice.

) } } export default About
